entities.name: gornuk
entities.description: Gornuk laughed and was mentioned as one of the goblins. He is described as laughing again later in the text.

entities.name: dean
entities.description: Dean asked what the joke was and didn't get it. He is also referred to by Ted as a good man.

entities.name: dirk
entities.description: Dirk replied to Dean's question about the joke and mentioned that Griphook had his small revenge before he left.

entities.name: griphook
entities.description: Griphook spoke in English and explained that if he had locked a Death Eater up, the sword would not have helped him break out. He is also referred to as a good man by Ted.

entities.name: ted
entities.description: Ted amended his statement about Griphook being a goblin and asked if Griphook managed to lock a Death Eater up in one of the old high-security vaults.

entities.name: severus snape
entities.description: Severus Snape was mentioned as not knowing something that Griphook knew. He is also referred to as having an office at Hogwarts where Gryï¬ƒndor's sword was kept.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry's breathing was shallow with excitement and he stared at Hermione listening hard.

entities.name: hermione
entities.description: Hermione stared at Harry listening hard along with him.

relationships.description: Griphook knew something that Severus Snape did not know. This is mentioned in the text as 'So is Severus Snape, though he does not know it'.
